CustomField.inlineHelpText: If client/store (account) has a rules/regs record with matching Program, Category and svcCodeType. If all of those are matching check the STATE on the Work Order and compare it to the rules/regs object. If rules/regs object "Installation_State_c" field says "Any" or if it the state code is a direct match to the state on the work order (address field) then the work order is marked for "Permit Required = Yes".
CustomField.label: Permit Required
